A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Terrible acting and pointless plot that seems to revolve around the painfully slow pursuit between ships capable of light speed. All battle scenes lack any real logic or sense. Daisy is great\, Driver is better than last go\, and Hamel is surprisingly not completely terrible. I'd rank it 6th behind 5\, 4\, 6\, 3\, and Rogue. Easily better than 1\, 2\, and 7.
